projects.title: Clue Game App
projects.description: Game application for a murder mistery game that allows the users to get to know a victim and investigate who killed the victim. Time is valuable in this game as 20 total killers are available and only 10 are rendered per game cycle.

projects.title: Cookies Store
projects.description: Project for a cookie stand that would render and update based on customers min and max generate a random number and amount of cookies sold per hour results would then be displayed in table for usage

projects.title: Chocolate Pizza
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working in CodeFellows I had to develop front-end implementation for an Adobe image I was able to use flexbox and core CSS features
